text:
Hi. We built a website on HubSpot pre-themes (i.e. templates using the drag/drop interface).  We are now migrating this over to a theme, while the user experience from a content perspective remains unchanged.
1. Am I able to create the theme, edit the pages in Content Staging to use the new theme, and test everything there?
2. If so, will I have to re-add all of the images/content to these pages?
3. Does it keep the URL as is or will I need to account for new URLs and URL mapping?

Yes you can build everything in staging.
Yes you'll have to add all the content again
Yes you can keep the same URLs, just match the pages URLs in staging with live pages URLs

Once it's ready you can push all your pages from staging live with one click. 

Let me know if you have any other questions
